name: Import new records into Betty Blocks from a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
Periodically check for new rows in Google Sheets and import them as new records into a Data model in Betty Blocks.

The template works with this sample Google Sheet (a fruit inventory) [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iJ9BMxilUemqOkv-dNl2dWzAosPGS3haGV0T-Q7k6jc/edit#gid=1582596100).

The template also expects a "Data model" in Betty Blocks with these properties:
1) Fruit Name as text
2) Price as number with decimal
3) Quality as list (High, Medium, Low)
4) Sold Since as date
